channel.title: I noob help with client plzz
channel.description:
ok....so i have downloaded like i dunno 2-3 diff client things or w/e...
i made ip stuf....downloaded ip.....went and did thing with router.....
i downloaded jdk.......
am i missin anytin? any ways...
wtf do i do now!?!?!?!?!? :confused:
i got 317 server thing frum this website..... i extract......and then i keep klikin on folder after folder till i hit an ampty 1...
i mean like rely what do i do know?? :confused:
i tried this 1 called allstar-scape or w/e and when i open the compiler and klik run is say i havnt downloaded jdk goto so and so's thing on mopar scape yaddah yaddah.......
i couldnt b more confused...
i feel like a level "2" yes a 2 just starting out!
thats worse then bein level 3! cmon i meen rely....
pleeeeeese help...
i just wanna have my own thing....try and have 1-3 friends onit or sumfin....ive been on for hours tryin to download garbage.....
pleeeze post and ty!
*P.S.* :eek:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2009, 04:37:14 pm[/size][hr]HELP PWEASE?

item.title: I noob help with client plzz
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

[quote=“dslight, post:5, topic:273423”]i got this thing allstar-scape v1 and it has thing “rune server” when i hit it say

-allstar-scape v1-
… online!

and tahts it…[/quote]

You are kidding, right? Please tell me this is a joke…

What did you expect runserver to do? It runs the server… Obviously. ‘tahts it’. The server is now running, hence the ‘… online!’.

You then need to find a client and log in to your server… It won’t do it itself…

Read full topic
item.source: I noob help with client plzz

item.title: I noob help with client plzz
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“dslight, post:5, topic:273423”]yeh were would runbat or w/e be :|[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2009, 05:24:13 pm[/size][hr]i got this thing allstar-scape v1 and it has thing “rune server” when i hit it say

-allstar-scape v1-
… online!

and tahts it…
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2009, 05:28:13 pm[/size][hr]and on any other thing i downloaded i cant find run.bat

and when i hit compile on allstar-scape then klik run!

it says jdk 5 -6 not on…

and i did enviroment variables!

why are computers soo stoopidly hard…
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2009, 05:49:57 pm[/size][hr]any1 their hello???[/quote]

Then just start your client and log in…

Read full topic

item.title: I noob help with client plzz
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

You need to run the server for your client to connect to it :S. Did you try that (probably) Please post more specifically what you need help on. Are you getting any errors, etc?

Read full topic
